content: this charming crochet pouch is perfect for holding trinkets keepsakes or small treasures featuring a classic granny square-inspired design it combines elegance with practicality the eyelet round adds a touch of whimsy while making it easy to cinch closed with the included tie whether you re gifting it or keeping it for yourself this quick and satisfying project is great for using up leftover yarn perfect for beginners looking to build confidence or experienced crocheters wanting a relaxing project i used three colors to make mine but you can use one to keep it uniform or multiple to make it colorful all my patterns are written in traditional and ez2read format ez2read formats are designed with people who are new to pattern reading in mind both patterns are conveniently on one pdf check out my website for free patterns and tips https //mirandafrazier88 wixsite com/moonlit-stitches
